item.title: Wrong location, 4th January
item.description:
This company repeatedly deposit a lot of bikes in the wrong part of Dulwich Wood Avenue. The bay is several 100ft away on the section oddly street which leads to Gipsy Hill.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dulwich Wood Avenue, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping and excessive litter, 4th January
item.description:
Under shrubs there is a lot of litter, including full black bin liners of waste. As the wind picks up it is blowing waste and litter over the newly planted area. Its attracting rats and foxes

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charnwood Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken metal bollard, 4th January

item.title: 15 uncollected bags, 4th January
item.description:
The council swept up and bagged leaves in our area, but when they came to collect all the bags they seemed to have forgotten our street as these bags have been on the street for a month. They are now getting damaged and ripped open and leaves are bags

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Geldeston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter from bin men, 4th January
item.description:
After the council had promptly reacted to a previous problem, the bin men have again dropped more on the pavements than emptied into the cart. There are also two open green boxes outside no 10, again rubbish is being blown up and down the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hilldrop Road, Sundridge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black ice, 4th January
item.description:
The is a large section of snow that has frozen over on the pavement out side 57 Perry hall Road. There has clearly been no gritting My elderly grandparents live there and is only a matter of time before the fall
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Perry Hall Road, Poverest, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 car seats dumped, 4th January
item.description:
2 car seats were dumped on the pavement a month ago. There's always lots of fly tipping along West Bank, both on the pavement and along the railway fence. It's horrible, and creates a trip hazard. Can you tell people on the street to stop doing this?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): West Bank, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead fox at a bus stop, 4th January
item.description:
I got off the bus and sadly there was a dead fox on the pavement on Nine Elms lane American embassy bus stop D
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Nine Elms Lane, Greater London

item.category: Dead animal in the carriageway or footway

item.title: 3 Months Abandoned on Estate Parking Lot, 4th January
item.description:
Car has been abandoned and illegally parked on private Vanbrugh Park Estate (Combe Ave) parking lot for months. Full of litter inside. Several parking tickets on dashboard.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combe Avenue, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Car parked for months on private estate, 4th January
item.description:
Car has been parked for months in private estate parking area with no permit. Parking violation tickets have been piling up on the windshield but no one has moved the car. I think it’s stolen or abandoned. In any case, it doesn’t have the permit to park on the estate and should be removed.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Combe Avenue, Blackheath
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Human excrement (possibly dog) on the pavement, 4th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Shannon Grove, Brixton, Greater London

item.title: Archdale house parking, 4th January
item.description:
There’s been a little kid, black around 7 years of age playing football in the car park and he’s caused some damage to several cars. He’s been told to stop but he continues to play football in the car park when the children’s park is next to the carpark
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Long Lane, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
